comment.body: tagging is hard to understand because commas and semi-colons does not separate phrases - instead it create tag with comma or a semi-colon. Newsline also not work, so how to add multiple tags please?
Some images (it is not too rare) are not uploaded (i tried in Firefox & Chrome) and shows blank image frame. Dev. console shows error, [check here](https://snag.gy/42wOzU.jpg).
